Text: BasilBrush, thank you for uploading this. There are 2 problems: one is that it stops about 2 mins in (not sure what to do about this) and no one's seeding. I saw the end of the programme late one night and would really love to watch it again. Please help!

I've tested it and I can't find any problem - it plays ok.

Try downloading the torrent from MVGroup - Piratebay add some extra trackers. The MKV is exactly the same file but your BitTorrent client will likely use the MVGroup tracker rather than one of the extra ones that Piratebay add.
